title: Even if the AOS is reduced to make the planning of the rehab sub- plot viable, a minimum of 15 percent of amenity open space shall be maintained
clause_text: Even if the AOS is reduced to make the planning of the rehab sub- plot viable, a minimum of 15 percent of amenity open space shall be maintained.
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
